Question:
Ukuhamba ngesantya sokuqala se-1.5 ×-10 ^ 6 m / s, iproton ingena kummandla we-magnetic field rhoqo we-1.5 T. Ukuba i-proton yokuqala ye-velocity vector yenza i-engile ye-30 ° kunye ne-magnetic field, bala isantya seproton 4 emva kokungena kwi-magnetic field.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Ukuze siphendule le mibuzo, siyasebenzisa umthetho we-Lorentz, owathi:

F = qvBsin(θ)

Apho:
F = Amandla we-Lorentz
q = Isilinganiso sesakhiwo se-proton
v = Isantya se-proton
B = Ububanzi be-magnetic field
θ = Inqaku phakathi kwevektora yesantya ne-magnetic field

Ngokwengxenye yokuqala, siyazi ukuba:
v = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s
B = 1.5 T
θ = 30°

Ngakho-ke, siyasebenzisa le formula:
F = qvBsin(θ)
F = (1.602 × 10^-19 C)(1.5 × 10^6 m/s)(1.5 T)(sin(30°))
F = 2.94 × 10^-13 N

Ngoku, ukuze sifumane isantya se-proton emva kokungena kwe-magnetic field, siyasebenzisa le formula:
F = ma
a = F/m
a = (2.94 × 10^-13 N) / (1.672 × 10^-27 kg)
a = 1.76 × 10^14 m/s^2

Ngakho-ke, isantya se-proton emva kokungena kwe-magnetic field ngu:
v = v₀ + at
v = (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) + (1.76 × 10^14 m/s^2)(4 s)
v = 7.04 × 10^6 m/s

Ngakho-ke, impendulo elungileyo ngu-B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

* Ukuphambuka okuqhelekileyo kwe-$23,000

* Isixeko siyalela i-ofisi yokuhlola ukuba iphakamise onke amaxabiso ezindlu ezihlolwayo nge-$5,000

Ukuze sifumane ukuphambuka komgangatho omtsha wamaxabiso ahlolwayo ezindlu esixekweni, siza kusebenzisa le formula:
Ukuphambuka komgangatho omtsha = Ukuphambuka okuqhelekileyo + (Amaxabiso ahlolwayo ezindlu esixekweni x 0.1) + (Inani lamaxabiso ahlolwayo ezindlu esixekweni x 5,000)

Ukuphambuka komgangatho omtsha = $23,000 + ($125,000 x 0.1) + ($125,000 x 5,000)
                        = $23,000 + $12,500 + $625,000
                        = $660,500

Ngoko ke, impendulo eyiyo ngu-D. $30,300.

Question:

Question:

Umthengi waphendula wathi, "Kuba isithandwa sam esasithenga nam sandixelela kamva ukuba sabona eli bhinqa likhubeka phezu kwebhakethi. GivenAnswer:

Question:

Ummangalelwa ucacise ukuba le ndoda yayihlala kumgangatho wokuqala kwaye indawo yayo yokuhlala yahlukile kweyommangalelwa. A.inikwe, kuba isigunyaziso asizange simthiye igama lommangalelwa.

4. Isigunyaziso asizange simthiye igama lommangalelwa, kuba amapolisa babengazi ukuba ummangalelwa uhlala kumgangatho wesibini wendawo yokuhlala.
